title: Knorr Chicken Challenge

asset.author: KnorrRecipes
asset.hookText:
I love chicken -- and so do most people. And you might think that the only decision to make was whether to grilled, roasted, stuff or fried your chicken.

But I've got a challenge for you.

Make a paste by mixing a little olive oil and a Knorr Chicken Stock Cube.

Season one chicken breast with this paste and the other just with salt and pepper, and then cook them in whatever way you normally like to.

And see which tastes better.

I promise you, the Knorr seasoning works better every time.
